eu.europa.esig.dss

Class DSSRevocationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.europa.esig.dss.DSSRevocationUtils

  • public final class DSSRevocationUtils
extends Object
    Utility class used to manipulate revocation data (OCSP, CRL)
